data.event: The 2002 national census estimated the population of Lira at 80,900.

event.title: 2010, the Uganda Bureau of Statistics (UBOS) estimated

data.event: In 2010, the Uganda Bureau of Statistics (UBOS) estimated the population at 105,100.
In 2011, UBOS estimated the mid-year population at 108,600.

event.title: August 2014, the national population census put

data.event: In August 2014, the national population census put the population at 99,059.
